item.title: Power Platform Clinic Episode 7: Automatically Tag DevOps Tickets by Email
item.description:
Auto-Tag DevOps Tickets via Email using Power Automate

In this episode of the Power Platform Clinic, we explore how to keep Azure DevOps tickets updated when discussions happen over email.

Why It‚Äôs Handy

You often need to chase suppliers or clients via email. This approach helps thread those email updates directly into DevOps using plus addressing and Power Automate.

item.title: Avoid Costly Mistakes: Backing Up Your Power Platform Development Environment
item.description:
What Would Happen If You Lost Your Dev Environment?

Ever wondered what would happen if someone accidentally deleted your development site or overwrote a key flow? Rebuilding from memory isn’t just frustrating ‚Äî it‚Äôs costly.

This post walks through the process I demonstrated during my session with the Power Platform Learner to Leader community, showing how to automatically back up your environment using Azure DevOps, without requiring advanced YAML knowledge.
